body.name: Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion with Soothing Prebiotic Oat, Gentle Lotion Nourishes Dry Skin With Moisture, Paraben-, Dye- & Fragrance-Free, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 12 fl. Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 19 mins
features: 12-fluid ounce bottle of Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion (Packaging may vary) with Prebiotic Oat intensely nourishes dry skin with clinically proven moisturization that lasts for 24 hours. To use, apply daily as often as needed

Nourishing lotion contains a unique soothing prebiotic oat formula that absorbs quickly, locks in moisture to nourish and help improve skin's natural moisture barrier, leaving your skin soft, beautiful and healthy looking

Moisturizing lotion works to help prevent, protect, and nourish dry skin. It replenishes moisture for softer and smoother skin. The gentle formula of the daily body lotion is free of fragrances, parabens and dyes and is suitable for sensitive skin
Lotion is non-greasy, non-comedogenic, and gentle enough for daily use as part of a regular beauty and skincare routine. From Aveeno, a dermatologist recommended brand for over 65 years
The Aveeno brand’s goal is to have 100% recyclable, reusable or compostable packaging by 2025. We’ve relied on nature for generations. Now we’re protecting its future
body.description: Product Description Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion with Prebiotic Oat formula intensely nourishes dry skin. Formulated with a soothing prebiotic oat, the fragrance-free lotion has clinically proven moisturization that lasts 24 hours. This daily body lotion nourishes and helps replenish skin's natural moisture barrier. The unique prebiotic oat formula absorbs quickly and nourishes dry skin with moisture, leaving your skin soft, beautiful and healthy-looking. Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Lotion's gentle formula does not contain fragrances, parabens, or dyes. From the dermatologist-recommended brand, this nourishing lotion for dry skin has been allergy tested and non-greasy, non-comedogenic, and gentle enough for daily use as part of a regular skincare and beauty routine. To use, apply daily as often as needed. Brand Story By Aveeno

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I love this daily moisturizing body lotion line. After trying so many moisturizers where some may leave me a bit too “greasy” with too much of a dewey look, and some being a little too light that feels like I need to keep reapplying, this is so nice!It is the perfect consistency for me. It feels like butter the way it spreads and settles in. Such a rich, moisturizing texture without the greasy look. Bonus points from me and why I will continue to purchase this product, is how easily available it is, the incredible prices, and most important for me is the different sizes it comes in—traveling on-board? NP the 2.5 oz bottles come in handy. Need a big size for home? NP. My new fav moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aveeno Daily Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Very good moisturizer. No scent. No grease! It is GOOD!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best affordable lotion that actually works so well. I found that it makes your skin look more youthful. Which is great for someone over 50. It is preferred over ANY other brand I have tried over the years. A must have. It is also great for itchy skin because of the oatmeal in the ingredients. Helps in the winter months for that reason. There is no scent so it won't clash with your perfume. I highly recommend to everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel size
reviews.reviewText: Nothing beats Aveeno lotions, in my experience. This three-pack of conveniently sized lotion is perfect for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great moisturizer creamNo smellNo stickinessGreat product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizing lotion with no perfumed scent
reviews.reviewText: I'm a guy and this is my lotion of choice for hands and face. What I like about this is that it doesn't have a "girly scent" like lavender, roses or something fruity. For guys it's actually really difficult to find a good product that really hydrates and yet doesn't smell like women perfume.This is fantastic for guys that work with their hands all day and keep having dry broken paperdry hands afterward. Just keep this handy (pun intended) and it will keep your hands feeling like normal again and not cracking in bloody lines. I also use it on my face at night before bed to keep myself look younger and fight off acne or bleemishes.I know it's not something a lot of men are used to do (to moisturize), but trust me guy, this is not rocket science and it will help keep your skin from hurting. You can apply it to the rest of your body too if you want your skin to be more elastic after a workout at the gym.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice to find a lotion that is not too heavy but yet is really moisturizing. I keep one by my chair in the den, one in the car and one in my bedroom. Easy to use and it WORKS!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On the go lotion
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to have one with my lunch box, one in my bathroom and one on my nightstand, easy access to lotion and I tend to hate the feeling of dry hands. I have sensitive skin and these don’t bother me at all. They also don’t leave me feeling gross or oily and is just right for me. Perfect size to travel with.
Una gran crema para uso diario, humecta, no tiene un olor muy penetrante y aparte te deja con una gran sensación y no es grasosa.
Very tiny bottles for given price. I was frustrated.

reviews.reviewText: I m very fond of aveeno baby product , great results no side effects to baby’s skin , highly reccommended
